front.title: IEC/IEEE International Standard for Nuclear power plants -- Instrumentation and control important to safety -- Electrical equipment condition monitoring methods -- Part 2: Indenter modulus - Amendment 1

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The scope is the correction of Figure 1, Figure 2, Figure A. 1 and Figure B.1 of IEC/IEEE 62582-2:2011.
